      • checkIfFlightAtWaypoint

        public boolean checkIfFlightAtWaypoint(Point waypoint)
        checkIfFlightAtWaypoint: checks whether a flight is close enough to a waypoint for it to be removed from it's plan.
        Overrides:
        checkIfFlightAtWaypoint in class Flight
        Returns:
        True if flight is at it's next waypoint and it is moving away from that waypoint.
